name: Shooting Jam
description:
Shooting Gallery

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Easy to learn and fun to play.

-Replayable to practice skill.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Movement with Mouse

Left mouse button - to score 1 point for the target

Right mouse button - to score 2 points for the target but lose 1 second of time.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Make your choices wise & get a high score!

Game is currently in early access & will be overhauled soon.

Leave recommendations for features in the comments!
